sentence: 26 ||| Introduction ||| 1.13 ||| Patients were excluded if they had received previous chemotherapy for metastatic disease, brain, or bone metastases as the only site of disease, a history of other cancers, except in situ cervix cancer radically resected and nonmelanoma skin cancer, prior history of cardiac disease or hypertension.

label: po.Disease
